com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.type

Class ContentTypeWidgetExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.type.ContentTypeWidgetExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Orderable, WidgetExtension<ContentTypeWidgetExtension,ContentTypeWidgetExtensionManagement>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivityContentTypeWidgetExtension, AttachmentContentTypeWidgetExtension, DiscussionContentTypeWidgetExtension, DocumentContentTypeWidgetExtension, ImageContentTypeWidgetExtension, LinkContentTypeWidgetExtension, VideoContentTypeWidgetExtension

    public class ContentTypeWidgetExtension
extends Object
implements WidgetExtension<ContentTypeWidgetExtension,ContentTypeWidgetExtensionManagement>
    This class allows to add new content types to Communote, for instance "Video", "Image" or "Document". Each content type can be part of one ore more categories. Content types can be used in conjunction with the ContentTypeWidget to allow filtering for content types.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

        propertyFilter - Property filter. See getPropertyFilter() for details.
        categories - Categories, this content type can be used in.

      • getPropertyFilter

        public String getPropertyFilter()
        The filter has to have the following format: ['Property','Group','Key','Value','MatchMode','Negate (Optional)']
        The elements are
        • Property: Class, the property is for, this can be one of "Note", "Entity" or "Dummy".
        • Group: The key group of this property. See com.communote.server.api.core.property.property.PropertyManagement.
        • Key: The key of the property. See com.communote.server.api.core.property.property.PropertyManagement.
        • Value: The value to compare of the property. See com.communote.server.api.core.property.property.PropertyManagement.
        • MatchMode: The name of one of PropertyFilter.MatchMode
        • Negate: If true, the filter will be negated. Default is false.
        Returns:
        The property filter for this content type.
        See Also:
        com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.type.TimelineQueryParametersConfigurator} for more information.

      • getTitleKey

        public String getTitleKey()
        Returns:
        Key for the title of the content type..
